txt.en: 'New orders from the War-tyrant... just in this morning. We're pushing ahead! The front's moving up towards the east, but those idiot Orcs at Tirith Rhaw can't control the bears who live around the keep. If we're going to build walls and fences near the fortress, we've got to deal with them.\n\n'Are you up for the challenge?'
'Ha! Good job clearing away those vermin. Go grab yourself an extra plate of slop before you head back out.'
The Morningthaw bears in the Ettenmoors are a hindrance to the Iron Crown's efforts to erect a new defensive barricade.
Morningthaw bears can be found around Tirith Rhaw in the Ettenmoors.\n\nSoldier Búzog asked you to defeat Morningthaw bears in the Ettenmoors.
Soldier Búzog is at Gramsfoot in the Ettenmoors.\n\nYou should tell Soldier Búzog that the bears are no longer a hindrance to the construction of the barricades.
